title: 6.5.3 Create ChatInput and ChatContainer components
body:
## Parent Issue
#27 - 6.5 Chat Interface + Dashboard UI

## Objective
Create chat input area and main container layout.

## Requirements
- ChatInput: Text input, send button, file attach button
- ChatContainer: Message list with scroll, input at bottom
- Send on Enter key
- Auto-scroll to bottom on new messages

## Files to Create
- `frontend/src/components/chat/ChatInput.tsx`
- `frontend/src/components/chat/ChatContainer.tsx`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Input accepts text
- [ ] Send button works
- [ ] Enter key sends message
- [ ] Messages scroll into view
- [ ] File attach button present

## Estimated Time
2 hours
